# Pull Request

## Summary

Describe what changed and why.

## Type of change

- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New hook/feature
- [ ] Docs update
- [ ] Refactor/maintenance

## Checklist

- [ ] Tests added/updated for behavior changes
- [ ] `npm test -- --ci --coverage` passes
- [ ] `npm run lint` passes
- [ ] `npm run typecheck` passes
- [ ] `npm run size` passes
- [ ] `npm run bench` passes (or N/A with reason)
- [ ] Docs updated (`README.md` and/or docs site)
- [ ] Exports updated in `src/index.ts` (if public API changed)
- [ ] `CHANGELOG.md` updated under `Unreleased` (if user-facing)
- [ ] Linked related issue(s)

## Validation evidence

Paste output snippets, screenshots, or links to CI runs.

## Notes for reviewers

Anything specific to focus on.
